scripts.postinstall: node -e "var fs = require('fs-extra'); fs.copy('node_modules/bootstrap', 'wwwroot/lib/bootstrap'); fs.copy('node_modules/bootstrap-table', 'wwwroot/lib/bootstrap-table'); fs.copy('node_modules/node-forge', 'wwwroot/lib/forge'); fs.copy('node_modules/jquery', 'wwwroot/lib/jquery'); fs.copy('node_modules/jquery-validation', 'wwwroot/lib/jquery-validation'); fs.copy('node_modules/jquery-validation-unobtrusive', 'wwwroot/lib/jquery-validation-unobtrusive'); fs.copy('node_modules/blueimp-gallery', 'wwwroot/lib/blueimp-gallery'); fs.copy('node_modules/video.js', 'wwwroot/lib/video.js'); fs.copy('node_modules/qrcodejs', 'wwwroot/lib/qrcodejs'); fs.copy('node_modules/@microsoft/signalr', 'wwwroot/lib/signalr'); fs.copy('node_modules/@microsoft/signalr-protocol-msgpack', 'wwwroot/lib/signalr-protocol-msgpack'); fs.copy('node_modules/msgpack5', 'wwwroot/lib/msgpack5');"
